front.title: Observations on "Link" in MANET/Autoconf and Other Contexts

abstract.t: Mobile Ad-hoc Networks (MANETs) comprise MANET routers, and connect to other networks via one or more MANET border routers. MANET routers communicate over semi-broadcast links which present interesting considerations for the classical IP model that are subject matter for this document. In particular, the term "link" requires careful examination in MANET/Autoconf and other contexts.
